name: alim
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))

comment: Restatement of Axiom ~ ax-4 , for labeling consistency. It should be the only theorem using ~ ax-4 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.)
